author: McNerdius
name: Blazor Server with Tailwind CSS v3
description: Use Tailwind 3's JIT & fast incremental builds alongside .NET Hot Reload in your Blazor Server projects.  Also enables use of Tailwind CSS functions & directives, nesting, and more in your Razor Components' Scoped CSS files.

Framework.description: The target framework for the project.

Include-VSC-Configs.description: Includes Hot Reload & Debug configurations plus some settings & extension recommendations.

Include-Watch-Script.description: Includes a PowerShell script to launch Blazor app & Tailwind CLI in Hot Reload & Incremental build modes, respectively.
